title: Mathematics Education Design for Pre-Service Teachers via Game-Based Mobile Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical concepts and general understanding of pedagogy
context.additional_context: Activity-based education exploring mathematical concepts embedded in everyday contexts using digital media and mobility.

learning_goals: Prospective teachers can identify and analyze mathematical concepts in everyday spaces (communities) through game-based mobile learning.
Learners can creatively express mathematical inquiry results using digital media tools (e.g., videos, infographics).
Participants recognize the importance of mathematical communication through collaborative problem-solving in a simulation environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
